title: Noiseless Pro 1.0.1 – Remove luma and chroma noise from photos
content: Noiseless Pro breathes new life into every photo! When taking photos in low light situations, every smartphone, compact camera, or DSLR creates “noise”, small color or light speckles that can ruin an otherwise cool photo. Noiseless Pro cleans up digital noise fast, with advanced technology to retain sharp details, with one-click operation, and at an […]

title: FastComputer 1.3.1 – Accelerate and optimize your Mac
content: FastComputer a new Mac-only computer accelerator and optimizer application with a powerful computer acceleration algorithm, gorgeous design and remarkably simple user interface. FastComputer is here to protect your computer from apps that eat up your computer’s resources. They slow your Mac down and can even freeze it completely! FastComputer is a powerful but simple weapon […]

title: Web Snapper 3.3.8 – Capture entire Web pages as single images or PDFs
content: Web Snapper lets you capture Web pages exactly as they appear in your browser. You can send them to a file as images or vector-based, multi-page PDFs. It captures the whole Web page – eliminating the need to cut, paste and crop multiple screen-shots when trying to create an image or PDF. Web Snapper integrates […]

title: Spillo 1.5.4 – Take full control over your bookmarks on Pinboard
content: Spillo is a powerful, beautiful and amazingly fast Pinboard client. Spillo lets you browse and organize your bookmarks in a stunning modern interface. Spillo also makes creating a bookmark from anywhere on your Mac as convenient as possible.   A beautiful interface Spillo has a beautiful modern interface that feels just right at home on […]

title: Pomodoro Time Pro 1.1 – Track time with the Pomodoro technique
content: Pomodoro Time is a powerful personal productivity tool incorporating the principles of the Pomodoro Technique. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use either your iPhone, iPad or Mac – your devices always stay in sync.   Key features: Manage your tasks Track your progress throughout the […]

title: Pinbox 1.1 – Pinboard client that allows you manage your bookmarks
content: Pinbox is a Pinboard client that allows you manage your bookmarks. It requires a paid pinboard.in account.   Features: Create, update and delete bookmarks Support tag suggestion Search bookmark by keyword Filter bookmarks by tags Group by tag Share to social network Support setting show URL or not Support hide dock icon Support record hotkey […]

title: Instastack 1.82 – Instagram Mac desktop client

title: Blogo 2.2.1 – Write, publish and manage multiple blogs
content: Blogo is the easiest and fastest way to write, publish and manage multiple blogs. Blogo gathered features for a powerful solution and helps users to publish and create content easily. title: Left 4 Dead 1.0 – A co-op action horror game for Mac
content: From Valve (the creators of Counter-Strike, Half-Life and more) comes Left 4 Dead, a co-op action horror game for the PC and Xbox 360 that casts up to four players in an epic struggle for survival against swarming zombie hordes and terrifying mutant monsters.   Set in the immediate aftermath of the zombie apocalypse, L4D’s […]

title: World Clock 1.2.3 – International time simplified
content: World Clock is a simple and powerful world clock.   Features: Add cities and timezones like GMT and UTC with a few key strokes. Convert international time with a drag of a cursor.
